name: Bruktbok.net
tagline: Sell and buy books at the University of Agder
body:
PROJECT TITLE:

Bruktbok.net

PURPOSE OF PROJECT:

bruktbok.net is a website made for students at UiA (Universitetet i Agder). The purpose of this project is to help students
sell their used educational books, and to give students an easy to use way of buying used books. A user of the site will put his/her books up for auction and other users will be able to bid on it. 

DEMO VERSION:

http://www.bruktbok.net

VERSION: 1.0.0
DATE:  11.12.2014 DD/MM/YYYY
    
The project was started by:

Vegard - pledge10@live.com  

Benedikthe - ebenedikthegsandoy@gmail.com 

Frank - youknow_lefranc@hotmail.com

SUPPORT:

Go to our wiki: https://github.com/pledgeco/bruktbok.net/wiki
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
